sense.gloss: mirror found in hell in Enma's chamber that allows people to see their good and bad deeds
mirror found in hell in Enma's chamber that allows people to see their good and bad deeds

k_ele.e: 瑠璃も玻璃も照らせば光る

r_ele.r: るりもはりもてらせばひかる

sense.gloss: cream rises to the top, great talent will stand out anywhere, lapis lazuli and crystals shine when lit up

k_ele.e: 瑠璃も玻璃も照らせば分かる

r_ele.r: るりもはりもてらせばわかる

sense.gloss: cream rises to the top, great talent will stand out anywhere, you realize what things are lapis lazuli and crystal when they are lit up
